RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BERNIETAKESCHARGE came away in good order and established a forward position, set a joint pace while on the inside, shook clear when shaken up into upper stretch, was given two light taps of a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker and drew off under a brisk hand-ride to prove much the best. RUN FOR YOUR HONEY went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was ridden along in the three path on the far turn, dropped to the two path into upper stretch, remained on her inside lead until the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead while moving out and narrowly earned the place. ONCE AN EAGLE went four then three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, moved further out outside the half-mile pole, was roused five wide on the far turn, chased the winner while remaining on her inside lead in the stretch and proved no match then just lost the place but was well clear for the show. GRAB THE GLORY veered out and hit the gate then was corrected by the rider, went six then five wide on the first turn, moved up on the outside early on the backstretch to set a joint pace, vied in the three then two path on the far turn, lost touch with the winner under a drive in upper stretch and weakened. DENVER'S ALLEY broke a step slow then was taken back by the rider, fought resistance while tugging rankly on the bit in the five path traveled around the first turn, pulled hard while rated on the outside without cover, was let out then roused in the four path on the far turn, chased into the stretch, dropped back on her inside lead then swapped to the proper lead at the furlong marker and had nothing left. BERTRILLE was hustled from the gate, raced five then four wide on the first turn, dropped back under coaxing on the backstretch, was urged three to four wide on the far turn, spun five wide into the stretch and failed to respond. DOWNTOWN CHANNEL raced inside to the two path on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along passing the nine-sixteenths, retreated along the rail on the far turn and faltered then was vanned off after the race. BOSSY JEANS settled in the two path, came up empty on the far turn and also faltered then was eased in the stretch but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Denver's Alley
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable Big Toe Stables LLC and Koshanostra Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Bernietakescharge
ENTRY.OWNER: Rosenthal, Robert D. and Bernstein, Bradford H.
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,shook clear 3/16,drew off,steady urging,much best

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer out brk,hit gate,6-5p1st,mvd up,out pace,3-2p2nd,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THESTRAL lunged at the start and came under coaxing to be three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, took over narrow command placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under challenge from flanking rivals a furlong out, then staved off both to inch away in the late going and prevail. TOOSHAY lunged at the break, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, continued in the two path into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then got rebuffed to the finish. DON'T TELL AMY bobbled at the break, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong from home, then got repelled to the wire. GRACEFUL lunged at the start, established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, briefly tucked inside into the backstretch before tipping back to the two path five and a half furlongs from home, tucked inside half a mile out, came under coaxing at the three-eighths when displaced from command, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Tell Amy
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable West Paces Racing LLC Murray Robert E and Lyden Michael P
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 2-3w, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, bid, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Graceful
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged st, in hand 2p, to ins 1/2, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Tooshay
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 7/16, 2w 1/4p, bid, rebuffed

ENTRY.NAME: Thestral
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged st, coaxed, 3-2w in aim, up coaxed 3/8, 4w uppr, inched cl

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 42000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VEGAS WEEKEND went to the front while three then two wide on the first turn, dropped closer to the rail onto the backstretch, showed the way with some company to her outside, moved to a solo advantage near the nine-sixteenths, vied inside on the far turn, responded well when set down in upper stretch then came under a right-handed crop, extended the advantage into the final furlong, switched to a left-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and proved much the best under steady urging. GRINGOTTS went two then three wide on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path near the seven-sixteenths, chased the winner under a drive into upper stretch, moved out around the three-sixteenths and proved no match while clear for the place. ITS COLD IN DEHERE broke out and hit the gate but left with the field, went four wide on the first turn, was rated outside down the backstretch, came under urging in the three path on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response. SUSPENDED CAMPAIGN dropped well behind the rest of the field while saving ground on the first turn, settled off the rail at the rear on the backstretch, came under coaxing near the half-mile pole, dropped back while getting some kickback in the two path early on the far turn, moved to three then four wide later on that bend, was roused for more in the process, drifted inward in upper stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Suspended Campaign
ENTRY.COMMENT: drp back ins 1st,off rail,fell back7/16,2-4p2nd,drft in3/16,empty

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gary and Mary West Stable, Inc.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEED SOME MONEY coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide, came under coaxing tucked to the two path three furlongs out when placed to coaxing, advanced to take over the front swinging four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under threat to the outside, inched away in the late stages rebuffing the challenge to prevail at the end. PROUD FOOT tossed her head at the start and broke in the air conceding two lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five then four wide, briefly tucked three wide and was placed to coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out issuing a challenge for command, got repelled inside that station and ran on to chase the winner home well clear of the rest and along second best. WILL BE FAMOUS six then five wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung six wide into upper stretch, improved position to procure the show honors. SHIGEKO chased five to six paths off the inside until tucked to the two path into the turn, came under coaxing two to three wide at the three-eighths, swung six to seven wide into upper stretch and passed tired foes. EXPLOSIVE EXCHANGE stumbled at the start but broke near the top despite it, cut the pace just off the inside, tucked inside into the turn and came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, yielded the front nearing the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. WORLD TRAVELER hustled from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened. NOW SHOWING coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside rank under restraint behind the leader and got checked near the half mile pole, chased along the inside through the turn before angling four wide into upper stretch, then weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Now Showing
ENTRY.OWNER: Hidden Brook Farm and Denholtz Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, rank, checked 1/2, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Explosive Exchange
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, cut pace 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: World Traveler
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Need Some Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 2p 3/8, up 4w upper, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Foot
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head, brk in air, chased 5-4w, 5w upper, bid, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Shigeko
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w early, to 2p 1/2, coaxed 2-3w 3/8, 6-7w upper, passed tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/8M Turf CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. INNER TURF (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GHOSTLYPRINCE rounded the first turn in the three path, settled outside without cover, was given some cover near the half-mile pole, moved closer while shifting from three to five wide on the far turn, was roused six wide into the stretch then rallied to make a bid, fought on even terms for the lead into the final sixteenth then gained a slim advantage and just held from the fast closing runner-up under strong urging. JARREAU saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear, moved closer in the three then four path on the far turn, was roused seven wide into the stretch, rallied on the far outside in the final furlong and closed strongly to just miss while narrowly up for the place. LORD FLINTSHIRE bobbled at the start, showed early speed between horses then was eased back, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled further out on the backstretch, was asked four wide on the far turn, made a five wide bid into upper stretch, battled with multiple foes to the finish and just missed while able to get the show. SHINSUN hit the outside of the gate and was off a bit slow, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, came under some urging late on the backstretch, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused six wide into the stretch, moved out while chasing and swapping leads back and forth near the furlong marker, pursued the vanguard to the wire and willingly earned the last spot in the superfecta. UNLEASH THE POWER went three then two wide on the first turn, was rated outside in the second flight, ranged up in the three path on the far turn, made a bid outside the quarter-pole, led in the four path into the stretch, lost the advantage narrowly under a drive into the final furlong, battled into the final sixteenth and was outfinished. FRONT MAN saved ground on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, moved closer in the two path on the final turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole then driven three wide into the stretch, chased into the final sixteenth and weakened. BUCKORTWO prompted the pace on the outside in the two three path, was asked on the final turn, chased near the rail into upper stretch and came up empty. SPLENDID SUMMER was hustled from the gate, showed speed inside of several rivals then was placed under tight restraint, became keen in response to that action while inside through the first turn, tugged hard at the bit under a stout hold while rated in the second flight, moved from the rail to the two path on the far turn, was taken in hand to going around the injured opponent late on that bend and faltered. WISECRAKEN was hustled from the gate, showed the way on the inside with company to his outside, was asked on the far turn, suffered an injury to his right hind leg near the five-sixteenths pole and was pulled up then vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Shinsun
ENTRY.OWNER: Edition Farm and Conroy Linda C

ENTRY.NAME: Front Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Buckortwo
ENTRY.OWNER: J and N Stables and Diamond M Stable

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Machmer Hall & D + J Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THREE RIVERS pressed the leader from the outside four paths off the rail down the backstretch and then from the two path through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole when taking over command, swung three wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive and was geared down inside the final sixteenth to the finish. PORTAGE broke out at the start, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled seven wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the place honors in the final jumps. MONGOLIAN PANTHER chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, went six to seven wide into upper stretch, weakened. SA FORADADA broke a half a beat slow, then got brushed by the breaking inwards CUZ UR PRETTY, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued along the inside into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. STARSHIP DEFIANT five paths off the inside down the backstretch early on, tucked to the two path half a mile from home, came under coaxing just past the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. CUZ UR PRETTY broke in at the start brushing SA FORADADA, established the front and showed the way coaxed along two to three wide before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, yielded the front and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then weakened in the drive. DIVINE CROSS broke out at the start, chased five wide until tucked to the two path into the turn, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, tipped three wide at the head of the stretch, weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Defiant
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w early, to 2p 1/2, chased 2p, angled 4-5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sa Foradada
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, brushed st, chased ins, ins 1/4, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Cuz Ur Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, coaxed along 2-3w, ins turn, yielded, 2w 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Three Rivers
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4-2w, coaxed near 1/4, up 3w upper, drew clr, geared down

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 5w early, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Portage
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 7w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 45000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACHILLES HEEL was hustled from the gate then angled in, went around the first turn in the two path, followed the solo leader down the backstretch, was urged in the three path on the final turn, gained four wide under a drive into upper stretch, closed well to get the lead outside the eighth-pole, battled outside of the runner-up in the final furlong, drifted in late and prevailed under strong urging. HAPPY BOB broke out at the start, moved in while going to the front, opened up a sizable advantage in the two to three path, came under some urging on the far turn, lost the lead to the winner while under a drive outside the furlong marker, fought on well to the finish but missed while clear for the place. BOYS CODE dropped well behind early, rounded the first turn in the four path, lagged at the rear, was urged while moving from the two path to the five path on the far turn, gained six wide into the stretch and improved for the show. LUCKY LUCKY LUKE bobbled at the start, saved ground on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along in the two path on the far turn, gained coming to the quarter-pole, dropped to the rail in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick while flattening out. STRONG LIGHT went two then three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged three wide on the far turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response while also flattening out. BREAK THE ICE went two then three wide on the first turn, was rated off the pace, saved ground under urging on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and failed to rally. SOUTH STREET was hustled from the gate, went three to four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked late on the backstretch, went four wide on the far turn, spun five wide into the stretch and had nothing left. MAMA BANNED ME broke out then was snatched up with the left-rein, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, settled towards the rear, passed the nine-sixteenths under urging and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Mama Banned Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,snatched with left rein,ins-3p turns,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Lucky Luke
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC Celeritas Racing LLC WLIR Ra

ENTRY.NAME: Boys Code
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M

ENTRY.NAME: Achilles Heel
ENTRY.OWNER: Nicholas Racing Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: FIN Stables and Sal-Lou J G Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Suzie O'Cain S. SARATOGA RACE 8 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 90. Stakes Purse 125000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 each which should accom pany the nomination; $625 to pass the entry box and an additional $625 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplement payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purs e to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 123 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstakes in 2023 or two races on the turf other than maiden, claiming ors tarter allowed 3 lbs.; of a race other than maiden, claiming or starter on the turf allowed 5 lbs. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. Closed Saturdd
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILVER SKILLET traded a bump at the start with THUNDARA, tracked the front along the inside through the first turn and then just off the inside down the backstretch settled in mid pack, tucked back inside through the far turn and advanced mildly under her own power, angled four wide into upper stretch let out for the drive, rallied outside a trio stacked heads apart with three-sixteenths to go, seized command just outside the eighth pole and edged clear under a drive to prevail. ORANGE FREEZE settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, remained patiently handled until placed to coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors on the wire. BERNT AGAIN tracked the pace along the inside from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three wide into upper stretch, got paused in behind SMOKIE EYES from the three-sixteenths to the eighth pole, then tipped out to follow SILVER SKILLET and offered up a mild bid to procure the show honors. SMOKIE EYES just off the inside tracking the top trio, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three wide at the head of the stretch, dug in prominent to the furlong grounds, then weakened in the late stages. THUNDARA broke in at the start and traded a bump with SILVER SKILLET at the break, settled just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. SNOWY EVENING three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. IM JUST KIDDIN forwardly placed in the two path through the first turn, was under a firm rating hold between foes into the backstretch, shook off the outside rival into the far turn and applied pressure to the leader getting set down taking the two path into upper stretch, dug in under a drive taking narrow command three-sixteenths from home, got headed near the eighth pole and weakened to the finish. KOSUKE under a light hold rated showing the way along the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch under threat, yielded the front with three-sixteenths remaining and weakened in the final furlong. COLLABORATION pulled eager early on and raced three wide through the first turn before settling three wide in aim outside the top pair down the backstretch, got shaken off some with half a mile to run, tucked inside near the three-eighths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, then tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Kosuke
ENTRY.COMMENT: light hold ins, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, yielded, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Smokie Eyes
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Bilinski Darlene and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, dug in, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Im Just Kiddin
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated betw foes 2p, set down 2w 1/4p, led 3/16, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bernt Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 5/16,3w uppr, paused beh foe to 1/8, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Skillet
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Tango Uniform Racing LLC and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: traded bump st, tracked 2p, ins 3/8, 4w uppr, up 1/8, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Thundara
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, traded bump st, 2p at rear, 5w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Orange Freeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Collaboration
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled early, 3w 1st turn, 3w in aim, to ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Snowy Evening
ENTRY.OWNER: Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Gleaves Philip A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAUCILOQUENT broke out and stumbled at the start, was urged along on the outside, went four wide on the turn, rallied approaching the quarter-pole, closed strongly to get the lead into upper stretch then shook clear, responded well in the final furlong and proved best under strong urging. MARLEY'S GHOST was sent hard from the start, chased the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, dropped to the two path into the stretch, pursued the leader under a drive into the final furlong and showed good courage to just get the place. RED BUTTERFLY broke out then was corrected by the rider, established a forward position under coaxing, chased inside on the turn, moved out under a drive in upper stretch, gained in the final furlong and just missed the place while clear for the show. GALATRONA broke alertly and went straight to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, vied in the two path on the turn, spun into the three path while losing the lead into upper stretch and tired. BEAUTIFULLY WICKED broke a step slow, was urged along well off the pace, went three wide on the turn and failed to threaten. TRUE MARTINI hit the outside of the gate then checked while making light contact with a foe, settled at the rear, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. ROXEN brushed with a rival while off a step slow, was hard ridden towards the back, raced inside to the two path on the turn and was no factor. KNOCKZCATOFFZFENCE stumbled at the start, was ridden along on the far outside, went four to five wide on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: True Martini
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,checked,settled at rear,2p-ins turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Roxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,step slow,hard ridden,ins-2path turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Beautifully Wicked
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,urged along,3wide turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Marley's Ghost
ENTRY.OWNER: Taste Of Victory Stables LLC Maslowski Frank and Youngblood Paul
